ResourceHeader.Description: Plasma structures at 400-850km altitudes in the equatorial ionosphere have been measured by the C/NOFS Planar Langmuir Probe (PLP). This PLP data set contains 1-sec resolution ion number density and its standard deviation, electron density, electron temperature, spacecraft potential, and spacecraft position in geodetic coordinates. As of 5/13/2010, the data were preliminary.

InformationURL.Name: C/NOFS PLP 1-s plasma parameter data
InformationURL.Description: 1-sec PLP avg key parameters preliminary data from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Plots, lists and files from CDAWeb.

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via FTP from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

NumericalData.Caveats: The data are PRELIMINARY, and as such, are intended for BROWSE PURPOSES ONLY. Continuous coverage not guaranteed; check the inventory graph for coverage.
